page.title: 10A SCHOOLGIRL'S DAY p.m.
page.content: The afternoon session begins at 1.10pm with registration; a legal requirement for schools. The lesson after registration is Rural Science which is generally a practical one and takes place in a laboratory. Afternoon break lasts 10 minutes, this prepares us for our final 2 lessons.At 3.40pm school finishes. I'm soon on my way home after a brief wait for the bus in the school yard. I'm looking forward to the disco tonight. Firstly I must feed, excercise and brush the dogs then feed the rabbits. Next I collect the coal, wood and charcoal and take them into the house. When these chores are completed I go for an evening jog to Caistor. When I return I have my tea and get ready for the disco. I will go to bed at 12.00 after enjoying the disco!
